content.prompt: An innovation that Manet employed in the painting was

choices.label: the sensuous modeling of the female nude
strong light and dark contrasts to create a flattening effect
the use of historical references to create a mythological allegory
choosing an interior scene for his depiction of a female nude

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
